Ebay Donations

Posted to Mottr.am by
Jack
on 03 July 2009. Tags: charity ebay

An interesting web-based alternative to chugging. I’d love to see some statistics beyond the running total of funds raised on the MissionFish website. Are people buying certain products more likely to donate? Does the amount spent on eBay effect the amount donated?
